english.segment1: It was prettier than poetry. The first time you said hello to me. Call it crazy, call it meant to be, yeah. But it didnt take me long to see
english.segment2: That you mean more than anyone
english.segment3: Im running in circles, jumping over hurdles. Working on a song to sing. I want to tell you how Im feeling. Finding it hard to do. Cause I dont know how to say it, dont know how youll take it. Dont know how to fall in love. But I want to learn with you
english.segment4: My friends say I should take it slow. But my dad says when you know, you know. So maybe Ill just rent a car. And Ill drive right back to where you are
english.segment5: Cause you mean more than anything
english.segment6: I never thought Id drop my guard. Then you broke into my clumsy heart
